Package inventory

Class StockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • inventory.StockManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    inventory.StockManagerInterface
    public class StockManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements inventory.StockManagerInterface
    Manage the stock in a business. The stock is described by zero or more Products.
    Version:
    2022 Sept 27
    Author:
    Dewan Mukto (dmimukto)

      • numberInStock

        public int numberInStock​(int id)
        Locate a product with the given ID, and return how many of this item are in stock. If the ID does not match any product, return zero.
        Specified by:
        numberInStock in interface inventory.StockManagerInterface
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the product.
        Returns:
        The quantity of the given product in stock.

      • loadSampleData

        public void loadSampleData​(java.lang.String[][] data)
        Load the stock inventory with the Product information contained in the data provided as a parameter to the method. The data parameter is a 2d array of strings. Earch row index i of the 2d array data[i] contains three strings: data[i][0] is a string containing the id of the ith product data[i][1] is a string containing the name/description of the ith product data[i][2] is a string containing the quantity of the ith product Note: some of these values will need to be converted from String type to int type.
        Specified by:
        loadSampleData in interface inventory.StockManagerInterface

      • orderStockProducts

        public void orderStockProducts​(int stockTarget)
        Add the products which has stock levels below the given amount to the onOrder list, but only if they are not already on the onOrder list. Change the quantity field in onOrder list to the difference between the current number on hand and the stockTarget
        Specified by:
        orderStockProducts in interface inventory.StockManagerInterface

      • lowStockProducts

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lowStockProducts​(int upperLimit)
        Return arraylist of all the products which has stock levels below the given amount
        Specified by:
        lowStockProducts in interface inventory.StockManagerInterface
